channel.title: Collagesartjeffrey Cyphers Wright on Jeffrey Cyphers Wright
channel.description: Recent content in Collagesartjeffrey Cyphers Wright on Jeffrey Cyphers Wright

item.title: Creatures
item.description: Raoul 2013 mixed media 8 x 8 in. Lucky 2013 mixed media 8 x 8 in. Windsor 2013 mixed media 8 x 8 in. Dogs 2013 mixed media 4 x 6 in. Wright taught science in an Upper Manhattan public school. His lessons were both educational and entertaining, especially entomology. The lab creatures serve double duty as new inspiration for his collage work.

item.title: Tinkerbelles
item.description: Pinky 2012 mixed media 8 x 8 in. Purple Tink 2012 mixed media 8 x 8 in. Seed Tink 2012 mixed media 4 x 6 in. Tinkerbelle hovers over graffiti, detritus, and grass-roots advertising garnered from East Village walls and lamp posts. The backdrop is an Eden for her flights of fancy. Tinkerbelle came into the picture around 2010 while Wright was teaching in the public schools and looking at or creating educational imagery, like coloring books.
